name: Bus Battle
description:
A horse has lost it's faithful knight to the terrible and evil bus. Not only does the bus have evil intentions with it's comfortable way of transportation, it is also trying to kill you! Your only hope is the beat and bop your way around obstacles, and save the world! ...Or maybe this is just the imagination of a child...

-Developed by Andreas Kærlev, Sebastian Eriksen, Jonathan Hertz, Narek Papoyan and Oscar Rode

-Made for Nordic Game Jam 2019
